newsitem.title: TURKEY: BASKETBALL-EAST EDGE OUT WEST BY THREE POINTS.
newsitem.headline: BASKETBALL-EAST EDGE OUT WEST BY THREE POINTS.

text.p: East beat West 117-114 in the inaugural FIBA Eurostars basketball match on Monday. Twenty-four of Europe's top basketball players produced a highly competitive contest despite the rapid turnover of players on court and much unfamiliarity between team members.
But West gave away too many loose balls on which East almost always capitalised.
Nikos Economou (25), David Rivers (19) and Petar Naumoski (16) all scored valuable points for East. West were overly reliant on Zoran Savic (30) for their points.
